code: @Override public RestResponse buildResponse(Response response, XContentBuilder builder) throws Exception {     // would be nice if we could make default methods final     assert response.isFragment() == false.     response.toXContent(builder, channel.request()).     RestResponse restResponse = new BytesRestResponse(response.status(), builder).     if (RestStatus.CREATED == restResponse.status()) {         final String location = extractLocation.apply(response).         if (location != null) {             restResponse.addHeader("Location", location).         }     }     return restResponse. }
